description:
There is a tutorial in game but I will put the controls and a little guidance 

Also, warning, loud noises

A & D = Move Left and right
E =  Pick up and put down near baby
Q = Interact with object

You need to baby sit 2 little babies, by grabbing them with E and interacting with Q, you can change their diapers, play with them, and then finally make them go to sleep, you must avoid that any of them get in trouble or danger, if they are in any, press Q in them to get them out to safety :D
